description: He worked with director James Cameron on the "Titanic"​ and the "Avatar" series.
title: Jon Landau, "Titanic" and "Avatar" producer, dies at 63

description: A Biden campaign spokesperson said in a statement that "it's not at all an uncommon practice for interviewees to share topics they would prefer," calling the questions "relevant to news of the day."
title: Biden campaign provided a list of approved questions for 2 radio interviews

description: Judy Belushi Pisano, actress and producer who worked in "The Blues Brothers" and "National Lampoon's Animal House" and was also the widow of comedian John Belushi, has died.
title: Judy Belushi-Pisano, actress and widow of John Belushi, dies at 73

description: It's been five weeks since President Biden announced a cease-fire proposal to attempt to end the war in Gaza. Now, there are new signs that progress might be being made as Israel and Hamas attempt to make a deal through their intermediaries.
title: New hope for cease-fire between Israel and Hamas

description: This summer, Frasca Food and Wine will celebrate 20 years as one of Colorado's most preeminent restaurants, overseen by wine expert Bobby Stuckey. The establishment, which pairs regional Italian dishes with an 800-bottle wine list, is now one of the state's first restaurants to earn a Michelin star.
title: Colorado restaurant pairs Italian dishes with perfect wines

description: Former squash athlete and acclaimed author Ivy Pochoda is one of the most talked-about writers in the country, with her latest novel "Sing Her Down" taking home the Los Angeles Times' Book Prize for a mystery or thriller earlier this year. Jeff Glor has more.
title: Athlete and author Ivy Pochoda on ambition, sports and more

description: Biden sits down for first interview since debate, says he will not drop out; Colorado restaurant pairs Italian dishes with perfect wines
title: 7/6: Saturday Morning

description: The mummies of Chile are the oldest in the world, but time, human development and climate change all pose a threat to the ancient relics. In Northern Chile, efforts are underway to preserve the remains.
title: The race to save the world's oldest mummies

description: Human development and climate change are putting the world's oldest mummies at risk.
title: Archaeologists in Chile race to preserve world's oldest mummies

description: Venetian glass is perhaps the most famous glass in the world. The island of Murano became the glass-making center of Europe in the 15th and 16th centuries, creating art that was so popular it was sought out by royals well into the 19th century. Today, the intricate pieces are still in demand, and one entrepreneur is making waves by turning an old world craft into modern day art. Dana Jacobson has more.
title: Meet the designer turning classic Venetian glass into modern art

description: The suspect fled the party, then shot and killed himself after a car chase, the Florence Police Department said.
title: 4 killed, 3 injured in mass shooting at birthday pool party in Kentucky

description: The man accused of killing three people when drove drunk into a crowd on the Lower East Side on July 4th​ was arraigned on a host of charges Saturday.
title: Driver in deadly July 4th NYC crash arraigned on host of charges

description: Minnesota Vikings rookie Khyree Jackson died early Saturday morning in a car accident in Maryland.
title: Minnesota Vikings rookie Khyree Jackson dies in Maryland car crash

description: A watch owned by Theodore Roosevelt was returned to the National Park Service after a decades-long journey. Roosevelt was given the watch in 1898, and it was stolen from a museum display in 1987 before resurfacing at an auction house last year. Michelle Miller has more.
title: Watch owned by Theodore Roosevelt recovered decades after theft

description: An anti-sunscreen movement is heating up online this summer, spreading misinformation that could lead to potentially dangerous behavior. Dermatologists are taking to social media to stop the misinformation.
title: Dermatologists battle online "anti-sunscreen movement" spreading misinformation, health risks

description: As summers grow warmer​, health providers from San Diego to New York are being challenged to better protect homeless patients.
title: Medics treat heat illnesses among homeless people as temperatures rise

description: The militant group – which controlled Gaza before triggering the war with an Oct. 7 attack on Israel – has reportedly given initial approval of the cease-fire deal.
title: Hamas appears to clear way for possible cease-fire deal with Israel

description: Supergroup Bonny Light Horseman brings together three successful musicians for a unique blend of folk and Americana music. Now making a return visit to Saturday Sessions with their new double album, "Keep Me On Your Mind / See You Free," here is Bonny Light Horseman with "When I Was Younger."
title: Saturday Sessions: Bonny Light Horseman performs "When I Was Younger"

description: Supergroup Bonny Light Horseman brings together three successful musicians for a unique blend of folk and Americana music. Now making a return visit to Saturday Sessions with their new double album, "Keep Me On Your Mind / See You Free," here is Bonny Light Horseman with "I Know You Know."
title: Saturday Sessions: Bonny Light Horseman performs "I Know You Know"

description: Supergroup Bonny Light Horseman brings together three successful musicians for a unique blend of folk and Americana music. Now making a return visit to Saturday Sessions with their new double album, "Keep Me On Your Mind / See You Free," here is Bonny Light Horseman with "Old Dutch."
title: Saturday Sessions: Bonny Light Horseman performs "Old Dutch"

description: Rep. Angie Craig is calling on President Biden to end his campaign for a second term after his shaky debate performance last week and what she called a "lack of a forceful response."
title: Rep. Angie Craig calls on Biden to drop out of 2024 presidential race

description: Keir Starmer's Labour Party delivered the biggest blow to the Conservatives in their two-century history in a landslide victory on a platform of change.
title: New U.K. prime minister says Rwanda deportation plan is "dead and buried"

description: The mill's huge sails, an emblem of the surrounding Montmartre neighborhood, inexplicably collapsed after an April show at the venue.
title: Moulin Rouge's iconic windmill sails restored after collapse

description: The issue came to light late last month, triggering an uproar over reports that two American service members had been charged with sexual assaults months earlier.
title: U.S. envoy expresses regret over alleged sex assaults by military personnel

description: Prince died of an accidental fentanyl overdose in 2016. He had no will, and his six siblings inherited equal interests in the estate.
title: Judge refuses to dismiss lawsuit in battle over pop icon Prince's estate

description: Masoud Pezeshkian, the sole moderate candidate running for president in Iran, has won the nation's runoff election, defeating a hardline candidate.
title: Masoud Pezeshkian wins Iran presidential runoff election

description: If you're watching the waves in California, you might spot an unusual surfer out there. Skyler, a 15-year-old dog, has been catching waves since she was a pup, handling the ocean's rhythms all on her own.
title: Meet the dog catching California waves

description: On this edition of CBS Mornings Deals, Adriane Kiss shows us items that might just become essentials in your everyday life. Visit cbsdeals.com to take advantage of these exclusive deals today. CBS earns commissions on purchases made through cbsdeals.com.
title: Exclusive discounts from CBS Mornings Deals

description: A brutal, slow-moving and potentially historic heat wave is intensifying on the West Coast and raising wildfire risks in California. In Sacramento, temperatures could top 111 degrees today, while a nearby wildfire has already destroyed over two dozen structures.
title: Slow-moving heat wave and wildfires pose threat in California

description: Beryl, the earliest Category 5 hurricane recorded thanks to record-warm ocean waters, is expected to regain hurricane strength as it takes aim at Texas. The storm pummeled Mexico on Friday and left at least 11 dead across the Caribbean. It could hit south Texas as early as Sunday.
title: Beryl expected to regain hurricane strength ahead of Texas landfall

description: President Biden joined ABC News for his first interview since last week's presidential debate. He said that he thinks no one else is more qualified to run and said he would not drop out of the race, despite mounting pressure about his age and capability.
title: Biden sits down for first interview since debate, says he will not drop out

description: President Biden said that he would stay in the race for president. Meanwhile, a new prime minister has taken the helm of the United Kingdom. All that and all that matters in today’s Eye Opener.
title: Eye Opener: Biden says he will stay in race

description: Tyrekennel Collins, 24, and Dezarrious Johnson, 18, broke out of the Claiborne County Detention Center at about 2:20 a.m. Friday, the Claiborne County Sheriff's Department said.
title: 2 Mississippi inmates awaiting murder trials escape from prison

description: The anti-sunscreen movement is spreading misinformation online, and some younger adults are questioning sun safety.
title: Dermatologists fight online sunscreen misinformation

description: Biden set for pivotal 24 hours with primetime interview; Friends save raccoon choking on cheese at cookout
title: 7/5: CBS Evening News

description: Pezeshkian promised no radical changes to Iran's Shiite theocracy in his campaign and long has held Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei as the final arbiter of all matters of state in the country.
title: Moderate Masoud Pezeshkian wins Iran's presidential election

description: President Biden is set for a make-or-break weekend for his political future as his reelection campaign tries to hit reset following last week's disastrous debate. Biden again vowed to stay in the race Friday at a campaign rally in the battleground state of Wisconsin, and will sit down for a primetime interview with George Stephanopoulos on ABC News. Scott MacFarlane has the latest.
title: Biden set for pivotal 24 hours with primetime interview
